s1.name: Other licenses
s1.p: JORAM includes softwares not provided by the ObjectWeb consortium and covered by the following licences:

ul.li: The Apache Software License, Version 1.1 covers:
the Regexp regular expression parser, used in JORAM message selection feature.
the Apache's implementation of SOAP, used by JORAM SOAP proxy.
the Xerces XML parser, used for JORAM platform configuration.
The CUP Parser Generator Copyright Notice, License, and Disclaimer covers the JavaCup Java parser generator, used in the message selection feature.
The Enhydra PUBLIC LICENSE covers the kXML J2ME XML parser, used by kJORAM for communicating with the JORAM platform.
